entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
